a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Sex gap in life expectancy at age 45, 1751 to 2023

The sex gap
period life expectancy
(females minus males), for people who have reached the age of 45. Positive
values indicate higher life expectancy among females; negative values indicate higher life expectancy among
Data source: Human Mortality Database (2024); UN, World Population Prospects (2024)
